Class TagDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.esm.dao.impl.TagDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TagDao
    @Repository
public class TagDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TagDao
    Class is implementation of interface TagDao for working with tag table in database.
